currency.help_string: Insert the name of the new currency. One word or emoji.

channel.help_string: Insert the channels where drops are supposed to spawn

roles.help_string: Insert the roles that you should be able to obtain through drops

channel.help_string: Insert the channel(s) where messages should be counted towards the leaderboard. If multiple, separate them by commas. To select all the channels, enter the value 'all'

result.help_string: Insert the channel where the result of the weekly leaderboard should be sent to
